jobs: PlanPageDealDetailPage: Decide on components for DealDetailPage, add sections to docs/tests.md

FixViolationSettingsComponents: Implement full SettingsPage with Email Notifications section (7 notification preference toggles with auth-only visibility, backed by notification-preferences API), Import & Export section (import/export buttons reusing existing CSV functionality), and Webhooks section (CRUD with add/edit modal including Zapier/n8n/custom setup guides, enable/disable toggle, delete with confirmation) per writeApp.md directives. Create notification-preferences and webhooks Netlify functions. Abstract into sub-components with data-testid attributes.

FixViolationSettingsTests: Write Playwright tests for all SettingsPage test entries per writeTests.md directives, covering Email Notifications toggles, Import & Export buttons, and Webhooks CRUD with setup guides
RunSettingsTests: Verify all SettingsPage Playwright tests pass

FixViolationUsersListComponents: Build UsersListPage - create users Netlify function (GET list with stats, GET detail), create UserCard and UsersGrid components, implement UsersListPage with card grid showing avatar/name/email/active-deals/open-tasks, add data-testid attributes, ensure navigation to /users/:userId on card click
RunTestsAfterUsersListFix: Run tests to verify UsersListPage implementation

FixViolationUsersListTests: Write Playwright tests for all UsersListPage test entries - verify page heading, user cards display, avatar/name/email/deals/tasks shown, card click navigates to /users/:userId, loading state, empty state
